fxInfo_clarification: This variable is dichotomized in a similar fashion as the V-Dem Multiple Selection questions with each binary answer category suffixed with "_<Response number>". If religious courts, labor courts, tax courts, military courts, courts charged with hearing cases against public officials, or courts of amparo are mentioned, please list any special provisions for these courts in the comments section. Choose all that apply.
fxInfo_question: For which of the following specialized courts does the constitution contain provisions?

fxInfo_responses.value: Courts charged with hearing cases against holders of public offices
Other, please specify in the comments section
